profile_section.title: My Profile
profile_section.description: Welcome to your personal space. Here, you can view and update your personal information such as your first name, last name, and email address. Make sure your information is always up to date for the best experience on our platform.

reset_password.title: Reset Password
reset_password.description: If you want to reset your password, please enter your email address below. You will receive a link to reset your password.

landing_page_section.title: Landing Page
landing_page_section.description: Easily and quickly create your own property listing page. Fill in the form below with your property's details, and our tool will generate a professional landing page ready to be shared with your prospects.

data_section.title: Advertisement Performance Data
data_section.description: This section allows you to track the performance of your real estate listings across different platforms.

created_pages_section.title: Real Estate Listing Management
created_pages_section.description: Here you will find all your generated real estate listings with their unique URLs and descriptions.
